Module mm
Package mm.utilities.PhysicsObjects

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • mm.utilities.PhysicsObjects.RigidBody
      • mm.utilities.PhysicsObjects.Ball
  • public class Ball
extends RigidBody
    Represents a circular rigid body in the physics simulation. Wraps a JBox2D body and provides a corresponding JavaFX circle shape for rendering.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private javafx.scene.shape.Circle circle  
      private float radius

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Ball​(float x, float y, float radius, float gradAngle, float density, float friction, org.jbox2d.dynamics.World world)
      Creates a dynamic Ball with specified position, radius, rotation, density, and friction.
      Ball​(float x, float y, float radius, float gradAngle, org.jbox2d.dynamics.World world)
      Creates a static Ball with specified position, radius, and rotation.
      Ball​(BallConf conf, org.jbox2d.dynamics.World world)
      Creates a Ball from a BallConf configuration object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ball

        public Ball​(float x,
            float y,
            float radius,
            float gradAngle,
            org.jbox2d.dynamics.World world)
        Creates a static Ball with specified position, radius, and rotation.
        Parameters:
        x - x-position in physics world units (meters)
        y - y-position in physics world units (meters)
        radius - radius of the ball in meters
        gradAngle - rotation angle in degrees
        world - the physics world where the body is created

      • Ball

        public Ball​(float x,
            float y,
            float radius,
            float gradAngle,
            float density,
            float friction,
            org.jbox2d.dynamics.World world)
        Creates a dynamic Ball with specified position, radius, rotation, density, and friction.
        Parameters:
        x - x-position in meters
        y - y-position in meters
        radius - radius in meters
        gradAngle - rotation angle in degrees
        density - density of the material
        friction - friction coefficient
        world - the physics world where the body is created

      • Ball

        public Ball​(BallConf conf,
            org.jbox2d.dynamics.World world)
        Creates a Ball from a BallConf configuration object. If density or friction is -1, the Ball is created as static. Otherwise, it is created as dynamic with specified physical properties.
        Parameters:
        conf - configuration object containing position, radius, angle, density, and friction
        world - the physics world where the body is created
